summary: Video learning platform with channels, courses, private video uploads, video/course settings editors, and personalized course recommendations
architectural_notes: Video settings editor must support editing all properties: title, description, privacy level, thumbnail, tags
Course settings editor must support editing all properties: title, description, image, visibility, pricing
Recommendation algorithm should analyze user watch history, likes, comments, and followed channels to suggest relevant courses

existing_features.title: Create a comprehensive video settings editor that allows users to edit all video properties after upload including title, description, category, privacy level, thumbnail, and membership tier restrictions

Create a comprehensive course settings editor that allows channel owners to edit all course properties after upload including title, description, course image, visibility settings, pricing, and tier requirements
Add a personalized 'Curated For You' course recommendations section on the main page that suggests courses based on the user's watch history, liked videos, commented videos, and followed channels

new_feature_requests.summary: Video settings editor allowing users to edit all video properties after upload
Course settings editor allowing users to edit all course properties after upload
Smart course recommendation system on main page based on user watch history, likes, comments, and followed channels
Implement backend recommendation algorithm that analyzes user activity (watched videos, liked videos, commented videos, followed channels) to generate relevant course suggestions
